column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column2: For if isolates collected from fields. Can be left blank if not applicable.

column4: Definition
The field's unique name. MUST BE UNIQUE
The field's number.
Any additional comments about the field.
The locality's city name.
The locality's state.
The locality's country.
The locality's zipcode.
Definition
The experiment name to which this isolate is a part of.
A unique ID in the format Af0001i. This is the ID that is printed on the isolate tubes. MUST BE UNIQUE
A human readable name for the isolate.
The plant organ that the isolate came from, if relevant.
Any additional comments about the isolates.
The genus of the isolate.
The species of the isolate.
A more general classification of the isolate's genotype.
The isolate's alias.
The isolate's race classification.
The isolate's subtaxa classification.
The common name for the disease this isolate is known to be linked to.
The Row ID from which the isolate was collected. Example 08PN0023. Leave blank if isolate not collected from a row.
The Field Name from which the isolate was collected. Example Aurora NY. Leave blank if not relevant.
The Plant ID from which the isolate was collected. Example 08PN0023_001. Leave blank if isolate not collected from a plant.
The Seed ID from which the isolate is associated. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Tissue ID from which the isolate was collected. Leave blank if isolate not collected from a tissue.
The Microbe ID from which the isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Well ID from which the isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Plate ID from which the isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The DNA ID from which the isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Culture ID from which the isolate was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The username of the person which collected the isolate. Example: firstname_lastname. Leave blank if isolate not collected.
The date when the isolate was collected. Format 2015-01-30. Leave blank if isolate not collected
The method which isolate was collected by. Example: Manual field harvest. Leave blank if isolate not collected
Any additional comments about the collection. Leave blank if isolate not collected.
The organization from which isolate was provided by. Leave blank if isolate not sourced from somewhere.
The first name of the person who provided the isolate. Leave blank if isolate not sourced from somewhere.
The last name of the person who provided the isolate. Leave blank if isolate not sourced from somewhere.
The phone of the person who provided the isolate. Leave blank if isolate not sourced from somewhere.
The email of the person who provided the isolate. Leave blank if isolate not sourced from somewhere.
Any additional comments about the isolate provider. Leave blank if isolate not sourced from somewhere.
A unique location name. Example: Plant Science 303G. MUST BE UNIQUE
The exact building name. Example: Plant Science, Weil Hall, or Emerson Hall
The exact room number. Example: 303
The shelf on which the isolate is located. Example: 1, 2, 3
The column in which the isolate is located. Example: A, B, C
The exact box name in which the isolate is located. Example: 08PN_box01
Any additional comments about the location.
